name: Cyrus Ginsberg
bio: Dedicated to fighting climate change and environmental racism through youth organizing and community action.

name: Marley Caron-Richman
bio: Committed to building a sustainable future and advocating for environmental justice in our communities.

name: Poppy Lee-Slovin
bio: Passionate about mobilizing youth to demand bold action on climate change and create systemic change.

name: Alex Siener
bio: Working to amplify the voices of young people in the fight for climate justice and environmental equity.

name: Kay Brahm-Robin
bio: Organizing for a just transition to renewable energy and fighting for frontline communities.

name: Teyo Chait
bio: Building power through grassroots organizing to create the political change we need to solve the climate crisis.
